text: Hello, I'll explain, since a while I feel bad.
I was recommended your services so here I am !
You have a...
Take a chewing-gum.
It's been months that I live with my husband and everything is perfect !
It's happiness, he understands me, he suppots me and he's always there to listen to me.
However, it's been hell since ma step-mother came to live at our place.
I suspect she doesn't see our relation as a good thing.
What makes you believe that?
I think you catch something, please continue
Yes, she keeps throwing some dark looks at me, it's hard for me.
She criticizes my every move. She won't stop saying I'm slack.
I don't find my words, she's the snake in my boot, the fox in the chicken coop, the iceberg in my Titanic.
Just asking but, did you lost a knife recently?
Yes but how do you know?
An intuition
After 15 years of work make you feel those things.
It's crazy what you are capable of!
You think there's a link between my step-mother and the knife?
I'll just sugest you to hide your knife while she stays at your home.
Sheâ€™s a thief as well as a pain in the ass, you think?
Not exactly what I was thinking but let's get back to you!
Anything else recently bothering you?
Why do you wanna get hypnotise?
I don't think so.
Please, make me confident so I can finally stood up to her and make her go!
Ok let's start!
Focus on my watch.
Try remembering a good memory.
Like watching a movie?
Oh yes a good movie!
But which one?
The Lion King.
Titanic.
Oh yes that was my favorite movie as a child!
Thanks for making me remember it!
Oh no! not Titanic, the iceberg is as cold as my step-mother and it's crushing our relationship like the boat!
I'll think of the Lion King instead my favorite movie as a child!
Now think of a place you can relax to.
Somewhere that makes me feel good?
Like at home?
Like the kitchen!
Like your bathroom!
Not the kitchen, step-mother always criticize my food and she even stole our knifes!
Oh yes! A warm bath is perfect!
You are great at this!
Finally, think of something or someone making you feel good!
I don't really feel good lately, any idea  ?
Your husband.
Your step-mother.
My husband yes, thinking of him feels good!
Not my step-mother she is the opposite of a good thing!
You ain't listening to what I'm saying. You're a fraud I'm leaving!
Yes, i'm feeling floating!
At my signal you will now be capable to stand up to your step-mother!
NOW!
